articles.title: Stan
articles.contents:
Stan
          
          
            
              I am an aspiring entrepreneur, having been involved in a tech start-up, consultancy and oil & gas industry since 2017. I spend my time exploring investment data and operational efficiency in the fund management industry. I am currently working on a project to connect participants in the OTC markets.
